description:
Everyone in the world uses smartphone apps. But inside them lurks unknown creatures called "Appli Monsters," or "Appmon." The Appmon are AI lifeforms with the ability to think and act, and exist in the boundary between the human world and digital space. In the vast sea of the internet, the "last boss AI" Leviathan takes control of the Appmon with a virus and begins hacking every system, thus starting to control the human world from the world of the net. http://anidb.net/ch82391 [Shinkai Haru] is led to acquire the Appli Drive, and uses it to materialize http://anidb.net/ch82390 [Gatchmon], a search app monster.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Shinkai Haru is an ordinary first year in middle school. But one day, the search app Appmon, Gatchmon, jumps out of his phone! Who`d have thought that there were App Monsters living inside your smartphone?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kensaku Kekka wa Shinkai Haru! Gacchimon Arawaru!
Search Result: Shinkai Haru! Gatchmon Appears!
検索結果は新海ハル! ガッチモンあらわる!

REGULAR.description:
The navigation apps people use to get around town are going haywire! Where`s everyone going?! And could an Appmon be behind this?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ayashiki Michi Saki Annainin! Sessha Nabimon de Gozaru!
The Suspicious Travel Guide! Navimon I Am!
あやしき道先案内人! 拙者ナビモンでござる!

REGULAR.description:
A popular smartphone RPG`s data is getting erased, so that players` hard-leveled characters end up in their birthday suits! Meanwhile, interfaces across the city are starting to act like they`re part of the game!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sodateta Chara ga Supponpon!? Ropelemon no Gakkou Dungeon!
The Character I Leveled Up Is Naked?! Ropuremon`s School Dungeon!
育てたキャラがスッポンポン!? ロープレモンの学校ダンジョン!

REGULAR.description:
Halloween is in town! While Haru is busy reading, Gatchmon heads out on his own. What`s with the picture that gets sent to Haru`s smartphone? What`s going on in the city?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Get You and Your Disguise Too! Cameramon`s Halloween Scandal!
Kasou no Kimi o Uitadakimasu! Cameramon no Halloween Scandal!
仮装のキミをうぃただきます! キャメラモンのハロウィンスキャンダル!

REGULAR.description:
Haru assumed he had the only App Drive in the world, but then he sees one fall out of newcomer idol Karan Eri`s bag! They go to the TV studio to find out the truth, but security is strict! What`s the plan, Haru?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Big Bang Punch Straight to Your Heart! Eri`s an Appmon Idol!
Anata no Heart ni Dokkan Punch! Eri wa Apumon Idol!
あなたのハートにドッカンパンチ! エリはアプモンアイドル!

REGULAR.description:
Eri gets a gig as a restaurant reviewer, but it turns out she`s not very good at it! For advice, she seeks out a mysterious figure behind a popular food review app, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saikou no Gourmet Report! Gourmet Appli Perorimon!
The Ultimate Restaurant Report! Dining App Perorimon!
最高のグルメレポート! グルメアプリ・ペロリモン!

REGULAR.description:
Asuka Torajiro, AKA Astora, is a popular AppTuber on a video streaming site. But is that... an App Drive appearing in one of his funny videos? Could he be an App Driver too?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 3つ目のアプリドライヴ! 虎次郎はアプチューバー!
Mittsume no Appli Drive! Torajirou wa Up Tuber!
The Third App Drive! Torajiro Is an AppTuber!

REGULAR.description:
A powerful rival to Astora appears! Astora`s own funny videos start getting lots of dislikes... which leads to a fight with Musimon?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A So Not Groovy Disaster?! Astora`s Funny Video Plan!
Dai Pinch de Chou Norenee!? Astra no Omoshiro Douga Daisakusen!
大ピンチで超ノレねえ!? アストラのおもしろ動画大作戦!

REGULAR.description:
It`s a grand rally for all the Appmon who`ve appeared so far! The Appmon ranking tournament begins, featuring... a 100 meter dash, karuta, and a portrait competition?! Who will be declared the ultimate Appmon?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aim for Number One! Appmon Championship in Cyber Arena!
Mezase Kakuzuke Number One! Apmon Senshuken in Cyber Arena!
めざせ格付けナンバーワン! アプモン選手権 イン サイバーアリーナ!

REGULAR.description:
Mailmon arrives with an invitation to the "Seven Code Meetup"! Ropuremon and Gomimon head out with everyone! But doesn`t it seem like Mailmon is acting strange...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Appmon-tachi no Akogare! Densetsu no Seven Code Kai!
The Dream of All Appmon: The Legendary Seven Code Meetup!
アプモンたちのあこがれ! 伝説のセブンコード会!

REGULAR.description:
The mysterious hacker Rei and Hackmon appear, and all of Haru`s Seven Code Appmon get stolen! They`ll have to dive into the sea of the `net and get them back!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dive in to the Sea of the `Net! Follow the Super Hacker, Rei!
Net no Umi ni Dive Seyo! Super Hacker Rei o Oe!
ネットの海にダイブせよ! スーパーハッカーレイを追え!

REGULAR.description:
The one who saves Haru and the others from Sakushimon`s attack is... Rei?! But isn`t he an enemy? Rei faces Sakushimon solo to try to retrieve his little brother Hajime! But what does Haru do next?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fighting Sakusimon Let`s Use a Super Applink to Smack Him Right Down!
Sakushimon: Chou Uplink de Uchiyabure!
サクシモン 超アプリンクで打ち破れ!

REGULAR.description:
The dates of December 24th and 25th disappear from smartphone calendars worldwide! Ai is despondent at the thought that the Kashinoki Books Christmas celebration might not go through. But just then, Gatchmon sees something!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Christmas Disappeared?! Date Thief Calendamon!
Christmas ga Kiechatta! Koyomi Dorobou Calendarmon!
クリスマスが消えちゃった! 暦泥棒カレンダモン!

REGULAR.description:
Haru and his friends enjoy writing New Year`s resolutions. Meanwhile, out in the city, chaos breaks out when puzzle games start appearing on screen displays! The screens won`t work unless you solve the puzzle... what do we do?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Machijuu ga Puzzle Game!? Puzzlemon Daibousou!
The City-Wide Puzzle Game?! Puzzlemon`s Rampage!
街中がパズルゲーム!? パズルモン大暴走!

REGULAR.description:
The team visits the fortune-telling app Appmon, Tellermon, to find the location of the next Seven Code Appmon! But when Tellermon is infected with the L-Virus...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mirai wa Zenbu Mieteiru!? Shinpi no Uranai Telamon
You See the Whole Future?! The Mysterious Divinator, Tellermon!
未来は全部見えている!? 神秘の占い・テラーモン

REGULAR.description:
At last, the secret of the App Drives comes out! The one who called to Haru from the App Drive turns out to be a very unexpected person! And where does a certain picture lead them?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Toki"o Koeta Message: Appli Drive no Shinjitsu
A Message from Across `Time!` The Truth of the App Drives!
『トキ』を超えたメッセージ アプリドライヴの真実

REGULAR.description:
The Fujimizaka New Year Festival will feature a guest performance by Karan Eri of Appliyama 470! But Copipemon works some mischief to fill the town with Eri videos! Will the concert to celebrate her new CD be canceled?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eri ga Copy-Pa de Dai Zoushoku!? Torimodose, Yume no Stage!
Eri`s Copy-Pasted Everywhere? Restore the Dream Concert!
エリがコピペで大増殖!? とりもどせ, 夢のステージ!

REGULAR.description:
L-Corp`s newest GPS game is a worldwide hit, and players converge on a seaside park searching for a super rare treasure! Haru and friends try to find it, too, but Resshamon causes a runaway train panic!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haru and Yujin`s Bond. Stop the Rampaging Resshamon!
Haru to Yuujin no Kizuna: Tomero! Bousou Resshamon!
ハルと勇仁の絆 止めろ! 暴走レッシャモン!

REGULAR.description:
It`s Valentine`s Day in the city, but everyone`s smartphones are in danger! Updating Waffle OS, the operating system used by 70% of the world`s phones, is causing them to freeze up and die...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Net no Umi ga Dai Pinch! "Toki" wa Kita, Kyoku App Gattai!!
The Sea of the `Net in Trouble! The `Time` Has Come: Ultimate App Fusion!
ネットの海が大ピンチ! 『トキ』は来た, 極アプ合体!!

REGULAR.description:
Astora`s going to train for two years?! While he struggles over whether to pursue his dream as a YouTuber, Dreammon presents him with a choice. Meanwhile, his father fails to return from his daily workout...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Farewell, Astora?! Dreammon`s Nightmare!
Sayonara Asutora!? Dreamon no Akumu!
さよならアストラ!? ドリーモンの悪夢!

REGULAR.description:
Eri wants to become one of the selected members of Appliyama 470! To pass the audition, she undergoes strict training under Coachmon`s tutelage! But is Coachmon secretly working for Leviathan?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Road to Be Top Idol! Coachmon`s Brutal Training!
Top Idol e no Michi! Coachmon no Moutokkun!
トップアイドルへの道! コーチモンの猛特訓!

REGULAR.description:
Two years ago, Rei was spending sleepless hours searching for his brother trapped in the sea of the `net. But just as he caught Leviathan`s trail, he ended up in danger of being hacked himself! Just then... Hackmon appeared!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Omae no Chikara o Ore ni Kase: Rei to Hackmon, Ano Hi no Deai
Share Your Power with Me. The Meeting of Rei and Hackmon.
お前の力を俺に貸せ レイとハックモン, あの日の出会い

REGULAR.description:
The team can`t reach the deep web until they take back Weatherdramon! As they race to retrieve the stolen chip from Mienumon, she too undergoes an App Fusion with an Ultimate Appmon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Take Back the Seven Code Appmon! Ultimate Versus Ultimate!
Torimodose Seven Code Appmon! Taiketsu: Kyoku vs Kyoku!
とりもどせセブンコードアプモン! 対決 極VS極!

REGULAR.description:
It`s time to put the Seven Code Chips into the Seven Code Pad and summon Dantemon! But what`s that thing coming down from the sky?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chou Kyodai Cometmon Shuurai!? Tobira o Hirake, Dantemon!
The Massive Cometmon`s Attack?! Open the Door, Dantemon!
超巨大コメットモン襲来!? 扉をひらけ, ダンテモン!

REGULAR.description:
With the Seven Code Bands in hand, Haru and the others dive into the deep web! In Leviathan-controlled Cyber Kowloon, they manage to save Drawmon from a data-destroying program worm, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Into the Deep Web at Last! The Mysterious Cyber Kowloon!
Tsui ni Sennyuu Deep Web! Nazo no Cyber Kyuu Ryuu!
ついに潜入ディープウェブ! 謎のサイバー九龍!

REGULAR.description:
The mystery of Leviathan is close to being solved! Time to look back on how Haru and the others met, and the hardest battles they`ve faced, while steeling our nerves to face off against Leviathan!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boku ga Shujinkou!? Gacchimon to no Deai
I`m a Protagonist?! My First Meeting with Gatchmon!
ボクが主人公!? ガッチモンとの出会い

REGULAR.description:
Eri`s decided to start using Appter. But it starts producing tweets without her knowledge... Meanwhile, a powerful Leviathan assassin attacks the team! Who will appear to save them in their most dangerous hour?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gonin Me no Appli-Driver!
The Fifth App Driver!
五人目のアプリドライヴァー!

REGULAR.description:
The battle with Sateramon is going south fast! But the one who comes to save them is Yujin, who`s partnered with Offmon and uses the powerful App Drive Duo!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: App Drive Duo! Offmon Appears!
Appli-Drive Duo! Offmon Arawaru
アプリドライヴDUO! オフモンあらわる

REGULAR.description:
Everyone`s crazy about Offmon! Gatchmon is sulking about it, and decides to flee the secret base in Apprealized form! Dokamon and Musimon decide to run away with him too...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Buddies No More? Gatchmon Leaves Home!
Buddy Kaishou!!? Gacchimon no Iede
バディ解消!? ガッチモンの家出

REGULAR.description:
Eri`s become a true master food reviewer! The female Perorimon, Maripero, comes to Eri to learn her secrets! But why does Dokamon have to look after her, then?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dokamon in Love?! Dining App Maripero Attacks!
Dokamon no Koi!? Gourmet Appli Maripero Shuurai!
ドカモンの恋!? グルメアプリ・マリペロ襲来!

REGULAR.description:
The App Driver team heads to a hot springs, but their travel app takes them to a creepy traditional inn instead! The scenery is scary and they get soaked to the bone... Something`s got to be wrong here!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tabi wa Michizure!? Trippmon no Kyoufu Trip
Travel Is About Companions?! Tripmon`s Trip of Terror!
旅は道連れ!? トリップモンの恐怖トリップ

REGULAR.description:
Traumatized after injuring Yujin`s, Offmon shuts himself away from the team. Haru and the others try to devise different strategies to get him to come back out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Draw Him Out Together! Offmon the Shut-in!
Minna de Tsuredase! Hikikomori no Offmon!
みんなで連れ出せ! 引きこもりのオフモン!

REGULAR.description:
To find his little brother Hajime, Rei and Hackmon dive back into the deep web. While searching for clues, they infiltrate the important individuals data center to steal top-secret information, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koukousei CEO! Unryuuji Knight Arawaru!
The Teen CEO! Unryuji Knight Appears!
高校生CEO! 雲龍寺ナイトあらわる!

REGULAR.description:
Massive corporation L-Corp doesn`t just create smartphone OSes and home electronics, they also sponsor Appliyama 470... and they`ve created a city run by artificial intelligence, which the whole gang gets to go see!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Thank You Mirai! Jinkouchinou no Machi e Youkoso!
Thank You, Future! Welcome to the AI City!
サンキュー未来! 人工知能の街へようこそ!

REGULAR.description:
It`s time for Appliyama 470`s biggest event, the ranking vote! Eri`s working her hardest to take the number one spot, but when the preliminary results come out, she gets the surprise of a lifetime!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Become One of the Nine Goddesses! The Appliyama 470 Elections!
Mezase 9 Nin God! Appli Yama 470 Sousenkyo!
めざせ9人ゴッド! アプリ山470総選挙!

REGULAR.description:
At last, the Appliyama 470 election results are revealed! Who will take #1? Who will be the new Nine Goddesses? Could Eri be one of them?! Meanwhile, Rei and Hackmon infiltrate L-Corp to investigate some mysterious video data!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sousenkyo Kecchaku! Eri ni Semaru Ma no Te!
The Election Results! Evil`s Clutches Reach for Eri!
総選挙決着! エリに迫る魔の手!

REGULAR.description:
Haru and the others have saved Eri, but they`re confronted by the Ultimate Four Appmon! The team Ultimate Apprealize all their Appmon to face them, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attack! The Appmon Ultimate Four!
Shuurai! Goku Upmon Ultimate 4!
襲来! 極アプモン・アルティメット4!

REGULAR.description:
Yujin is captured by the Ultimate Four, and the App Drives are destroyed, meaning Gatchmon and the others are all gone! Haru is feeling adrift, when suddenly, he hears a voice from an unexpected place...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gacchimon o Torimodose! Den`emon Jii-chan no Shiren!
Take Back Gatchmon! Grandpa Deneimon`s Test!
ガッチモンを取り戻せ! 電衛門じいちゃんの試練!

REGULAR.description:
With the help of Deneimon, Haru and the others acquire App Drive Duos, and head to the Appmon Graveyard to save Yujin! What is the secret power hidden inside their new Drives?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Power: The App Drive Duo!
Arata na Chikara! App Drive Duo!
新たな力! アプリドライヴDUO!

REGULAR.description:
The rest of the team leave Rei and Hackmon to face Biomon as they race forward, but Eri and Dokamon are confronted by Beautymon, and Torajiro and Musimon are stopped by Fakemon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Return of the Ultimate Four! Cloud`s Challenge!
Ultimate 4 Futatabi! Cloud no Chousenjou!
アルティメット4再び! クラウドの挑戦状!

REGULAR.description:
Haru arrives at Charisma Castle, where Yujin is being held by Leviathan. There, he faces off with the strongest of the Ultimate Four, Charismon, and learns the true identity of the sinister Cloud!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyokugen no Gekitou! Globemon VS Charmon!
The Ultimate Clash! Globemon Versus Charismon!
極限の激闘! グローブモンVSカリスモン!

REGULAR.description:
Rei has found a clue about Hajime`s whereabouts. Though Eri is thinking of quitting Appliyama because of L-Corp`s new CEO, he gets her to agree to let him disguise as her manager to infiltrate the company. But what is his plan?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rei no Ketsui! Hajime Sousaku Daisakusen!
Rei`s Determination! The Plan to Take Back Hajime!
レイの決意! はじめ捜索大作戦!

REGULAR.description:
Let`s see who can get Sleepmon to wake up first! The Appmon try all different kinds of tactics, but Sleepmon shows no sign of waking, so...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mezamero, Sleepmon! Appmon Senshuken Futatabi!!
Wake Up, Sleepmon! Return of the Appmon Championship!
目覚めろ, スリープモン! アプモン選手権再び!!

REGULAR.description:
Hajime, finally himself again, learns of Operation: Human Applications, a plan to turn all of humanity into easily-regulated data. And the key to stopping Leviathan`s terrible plan is... Bootmon?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Catch the Runaway Bootmon!
Toubousha Buutomon o Oe!
逃亡者・ブートモンを追え!

REGULAR.description:
Video game characters are causing chaos in IOT devices everywhere! Haru finds that a common link behind the rampages is a character from a monster-raising RPG he played as a child...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Collision?! Gatchmon Versus Agumon!
Daigekitou!? Gacchimon vs Agumon!
大激突!? ガッチモンVSアグモン!

REGULAR.description:
Astora is determined to stream a meteor shower live for a special fan in the hospital, but he`s ambushed and sent to live at an inescapable temple complex. Time for the team to run a jailbreak!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hoshizora no Chikai! Asutora Kyuushutsu Daisakusen!
The Starry Sky Promise! The Great Astora Escape Plan!
星空の誓い! アストラ救出大作戦!

REGULAR.description:
Bootmon keeps running away with his emergency evacuation program! The team completes a special program which lets Haru finally make contact... but just then, Yujin starts acting strangely...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Truth About Yujin
Yuujin no Shinjitsu
勇仁の真実

REGULAR.description:
Just as things seemed to be working out, Yujin revealed his terrible secret: he was a Leviathan-created AI all along! Bootmon is evolved into a more advanced form, and the God-grades are released...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Activate! Operation: Human Applications!
Kidou! Jinrui Appli Kakeikaku!
起動! 人類アプリ化計画!

REGULAR.description:
Leviathan initiates Operation: Human Applications, and little by little, the people of the world are converted into apps. Eri, Astora, and Rei apprealize their God Appmon to try to defeat Deusmon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiseki no Saishuu Shinka! Kami Appmon Kourin!
The Miraculous Final Evolution! The God Appmon Descend!
奇跡の最終進化! 神アプモン降臨!

REGULAR.description:
A massive shadow appears in the skies and throws the city into chaos! Who would have thought Leviathan would apprealize, too? Haru gets the Gaiamon chip, but can he bring back his best friend Yujin?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bonds of Hope! Haru and Gaiamon!!
Kibou no Kizuna! Haru to Gaeamon!!
希望の絆! ハルとガイアモン!!

REGULAR.description:
More and more people are bathed in Leviathan`s light, and turned into apps. Leviathan has also consumed the God Appmon to install them into himself. Can he be stopped?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jinkouchinou no Miru Yume
The Artificial Intelligence`s Dream
人工知能の見る夢

REGULAR.description:
It`s finally time for the showdown with Leviathan, and to show him Haru and Gatchmon`s buddy power! The App Drivers will all stand up to ensure humanity`s future!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bokutachi no Singularity
Our Singularity
ボクたちのシンギュラリティー
Opening 1
Opening 2
Ending 1
Ending 2
Ending 3
Ending 4

WIKIPEDIA_JP: デジモンユニバース_アプリモンスターズ

titles.title: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters
Digimon Universe: APP Monsters
Digimon Universe: App Monsters
デジモンユニバース アプリモンスターズ
数码兽宇宙 应用怪兽
Digimon: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters
